thread.title: Vt. man accused of leading police on chase
thread.title_full: Vt. man accused of leading police on chase - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: WCAX News
title: Vt. man accused of leading police on chase
text:
PITTSFORD, Vt. - A Pittsford man faces several charges after allegedly trying to flee from Vermont State Police.
Police tried to stop Randall Reynolds, 22, in Rutland City Monday night, but they say he sped off, hitting a tractor-trailer and a Vermont State Police cruiser along the way. At one point, police say Reynolds was driving 80 mph within the city. Police say Reynolds crashed his car on West Street, but not before causing property damage. Police say he then took off on foot.
Eventually troopers picked him up in Pittsford Tuesday morning. He faces a host of charges, including attempting to elude a police officer and leaving the scene of an accident.
